import SearchFieldWithNoLabel from './SearchFieldWithNoLabel?dev-site-example';

# Search Field with No Label

### Description

This example demonstrates a [Search Field](/components/cerner-terra-core-docs/search-field/about) with no label. This example has isLabelVisible prop set to false and the groupName prop set to a custom text for better accessibility. 

<SearchFieldWithNoLabel title='Search Field with No Label' />
